name: DECLASSIFY UAP LLC
description: Grassroots and direct lobbying for government UAP declassification
sampleDescriptions: Lobbing activities will be focused on the issue of Federal declassification of information (currently classified) on the topic of Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena, otherwise known as UAP or UFOs. This
